lesson_html:
• Hello! - A common way to greet someone.
  • How are you? - A friendly way to ask about someone's well-being.
  • Good morning/afternoon/evening! - Time-specific greetings to show politeness.
  • Nice to meet you! - Used when meeting someone for the first time.
  • Goodbye! - A way to say farewell when parting.

items.explanation_en: A common way to greet someone in the morning.
A friendly inquiry about someone's recent state.
A simple question often asked in conversation.
A caring question to check on someone's well-being.
A polite expression of concern for someone's health.
A question about someone's activities from the previous day.

items.en: Do you have any plans for tomorrow?
items.explanation_en: An inquiry about someone's upcoming schedule.
A phrase used when reconnecting with someone after some time.
A friendly way to say goodbye while expressing care.

items.en: I look forward to seeing you.
items.explanation_en: A positive statement expressing anticipation for a future meeting.
